GSD.description:
drm/amd/amdkfd: Fix kernel panic when reset failed and been triggered again

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.84 by commit 74aafe99efb68f15e50be9f7032c2168512f98a8. For more details please see the references link.
